name: VisualHarvesting
author: Urm/uramer
description: This is a tes3mp version of graphic herbalism. Players can activate  plants, removing them from the world and gaining ingredients. Whenever a  cell is loaded, all the harvested plants respawn, if enough time has  passed.

name: BetterVanillaLeveling
author: Urm/uramer
description: A collection of popular improvements to vanilla leveling mechanics.  Fixed attribute modifiers, level cap, rescaled base health,natural progression - gain attributes by increasing skills.

name: WeatherController
author: Urm/uramer
description: Gives full control over weather to the server, defined by configurable Markov chains per month (allowing seasons.

name: CellReset
author: Urm/uramer
description: This script simply removes all but specified cells' files on server  startup, if enough time has passed since they were last visited. This  allows creatures to spawn in a way most similar to single player OpenMW.

name: FullLoot
author: Urm/uramer
description: Empties player's inventory on death and spawns a container with its contents, available for anyone to take.

name: DoorFramework
author: Urm/uramer
description: A complete solution to create custom doors.

name: ShutdownServer
author: Urm/uramer
description: Allows you to exit the server in orderly fashion, while triggering the 'OnServerExit' event (important for most of my scripts. Also makes sure to save all the data in case 'OnServerExit' is triggered by a lua crash.

name: OriginalStart
author: Urm/uramer
description: Fixes most of the issues related to vanilla game start. However, the  tes3mp chargen style is kept, so a lot of the voiced dialogue is skipped.

name: FootPrints
author: Urm/uramer
description: Spawns a trail of invisible objects behind every player. Other players can see them using the Detect Key spell effect.

name: DropFramework
author: Urm/uramer
description: A set of simple tools to spawn random loot.

name: PlayerLobby
author: Urm/uramer
description: Spawns all new characters in a designated lobby cell. Can be used to  present different starting location choices, staring equipment or other  server related activities.

name: Artkwend
author: Urm/uramer
description: This script fixes some of the issues with Arktwend in TES3MP. Only lightly untested.

name: DoubleTrouble
author: Urm/uramer
description: This script only handles cells on the first visit, resetting if the cell file was not present on server startup.That means, that only cell reset scripts that actually remove cell files will cause creatures to be re-duplicated.

name: CustomAlchemy
author: Urm/uramer
description: **customAlchemy** reimpliments vanilla alchemy mechanics to  allow batch potion brewing, server side customization and improvement  of server performance.

name: ActivatePlayer
author: rickoff
description: Raises a player by activating it for now, later: pickpocketing, direct haggling, invitation

name: Bank
author: rickoff
description: Personal banking system, deposit, withdraw soon make the transfer but pay attention to taxes

name: Compagnon
author: rickoff
description: call companions and give them orders to follow, activated, stop and other

name: DeathDrop
author: rickoff
description: This is the modified version of DeathDrop made for Rickoff so that only gold is left to death except 100

name: EcarlateSoul
author: rickoff
description: An experience gain system with skill chart, inspired by ragefire

name: Housing
author: rickoff
description: The ultimate script for buying house, land and supply,shop system, also  allows placing objects in the space. Written by Atkana translated and  adapted for the Ecarlate server

name: HunterWorld
author: rickoff
description: add 100 random spawn point for creature or npcwhen a boss creature appears the players receive a messagewhen a player kills a boss he receives a reward and a message displays that a rare creature was killed

name: MarketPlace
author: rickoff
description: A global marketplace to sell your items or buy items put up for sale by other players

name: WorldMining
author: rickoff
description: Mine rocks and trees with the specific axe

name: DeathChoice
author: rickoff
description: Gives player choice to revive or wait on timer

name: ResetSolution
author: rickoff
description: A way to reset guild data such as rank, eviction, reputation, and quest log entries

name: Tournament
author: rickoff
description: sign up! wait for the countdown! fight! win prizes!

name: TrueSurvive
author: rickoff
description: A script that simulates the primary need for survival( sleep, drink, eat, attack max, weather

name: VampWolfFix
author: rickoff
description: Fix Werewolf/Vampire status for player

name: VoiceBot
author: rickoff
description: Bot vocal Discord with position player on server

name: Wanted
author: rickoff
description: The Skvysh script translates and adapts for the Ecarlate server

name: DirectTrade
author: Schnibbsel
description: Its a EasyMarket You can exchange Items with other Players against Gold

name: DirtyDisableFriendlyFire
author: Schnibbsel
description: If you accidentally hit your buddy and kill him. He will be instantly resurrected. This is a dirty Version to stop Friendly Fire.

name: PARTYsystem
author: Schnibbsel
description: This is a Grouping Up / Party - System

name: PlaceBountyOnOthers
author: Schnibbsel
description: Place bounties on other players and hunt them down to gather the bounty.

name: Worldbuilding
author: Schnibbsel
description: place Objects ingame create complete Dungeons works with cellreset through preObjects craft materials to buy objects

name: Alternate Start
author: Boyos999
description: Allows the player to select a location to spawn at when their character is first created

name: Dungeon Loot
author: Boyos999
description: Script for a hopefully modular system of cooldown based looting.

name: Note Writing
author: Boyos999
description: Use /write <text> (without <> to create a note with given text. Makes a check to see if the player has the required item(s (only paper by default.

name: Potion Limiter
author: Boyos999
description: Limits the number of active potion effects a player can have on them,  by default this is 3 at alchemy less than 50, gaining one extra at 50, 75, and 100 alchemy. For use with non-vanilla potions, you need to add the required  information following the format in vanillapotions.json, any custom  records should work by defaultDisclaimer: I have no idea what the performance impact of this is

name: Random Helper
author: Boyos999
description: it's like 4 lines, basically sets random seed when server launches

name: Res Menu
author: Boyos999
description: Gives the player the choice of respawning at an imperial shrine or tribunal temple on death, as opposed to it being random

name: Starter Equipment
author: Boyos999
description: A simple script to add some basic starter equipment to players based on their skills

name: TES3MP-npcReset
author: rnate
description: This script will log the time the player enters a cell, and then  depending on the resetTime (default 1 hour of real time, run the  console command 'RA'

name: tes3mp-roleplay-chat-essentials
author: David-AW
description: local chat, OOC/Local OOC, Nicknames, /me

name: tes3mp-Script-Loader
author: David-AW
description: This script makes it easier to develop and install custom scripts. Just drop the custom script into **mpstuff/scripts/** and add it to **mpstuff/data/scripts.json**.If your server is already online and you want to load up a script you just made/added; follow the steps above and then do /loadscript scriptname

name: tes3mp-safezone-dropitems
author: David-AW
description: safezones and drop items on death, configurable.

name: tes3mp-disable-assassins
author: David-AW
description: Disable Tribunal assassins

name: CellReset
author: Atkana
description: Cell Reset is a script for periodically resetting the game's cells to  their default states, in a manner that tries to avoid all the potential  problems other methods might cause (for example, manually deleting a cell's .json entry can lead to problems!. The server owner  can configure how often these happen, as well as provide a list of  cells that they don't want to be affected.

name: GeneralGUI
author: Atkana
description: This is just some generalised way of using tes3mp's GUI stuff that I'll  most likely use for my scripts from now on. It doesn't make using them  any easier (in fact, it makes more work, however it offers a basic  structure to use. I'd initially intended to simply insert this into  every script I needed to use it in rather than making it into a fully-fledged module in order to cut down on installation steps, but  either way requires at least some installation, so I relented :P (Though  I may still use it the former way, anyways

name: HotkeysExpanded
author: Atkana
description: Hotkeys Expanded utilizes the custom item system to add some new, mostly  tes3mp-related functions for use for players via quick keys. These  include: equipping sets of items, sending messages (or commands in  chat, playing specific sounds, switching quick key bars, and running  script functions with set parameters.

name: ServerWarp
author: Atkana
description: Adds a /warp series of commands for ... warping.

name: kanaBank
author: Atkana
description: Provides access to personal storage for players to utilize via command, or by activating predesignatedbankers

name: kanaMOTD
author: Atkana
description: Displays a MOTD message to every player who joins the server.

name: kanaRevive
author: Atkana
description: Players enter a downed state instead of dying. Other players can activate them to revive them before they bleed out.

name: kanaStartingItems
author: Atkana
description: Grant newly created characters some configurable starting items based on  their race, class, skills, favored armor, and birth sign.

name: flatModifiers
author: Atkana
description: Change the way that the attribute advancement modifiers on level up  are calculated. It can be configured to give a flat bonus to all  players, or a tailored bonus based on their class. Requires *classInfo*. (Note: Depending on the hot fix level of your version of 0.7-prerelease, the lines tes3mp.SendSkills(pid may not be necessary

name: classInfo
author: Atkana
description: A compilation of data on the game's base classes and some related  functions for use in server scripts. NPC classes not yet implemented.

name: ccBuild
author: Texafornian
description: /build - Teleports players to a special cell where objects can be spawned No penalties upon dying in the cell, even for hardcore players Module can be configured to enable or disable wiping of the build cell

name: ccCellReset
author: Texafornian
description: Choose when your cells will be wiped upon server restart, if at all

name: ccFactions
author: Texafornian
description: Players can create and manage factions/guilds A faction can claim one cell and members will respawn there upon death /f - Faction chat /faction - Main faction control window

name: ccHardcore
author: Texafornian
description: Players can opt intopermadeathafter chargen- /ladder - Displays the HC players from highest level to lowest- Configure whether HC players drop gold on death- Configure optional safe cells (ccConfig.lua for HC players

name: ccHolidays
author: Texafornian
description: Choose which holidays/events your server will celebrate- /holiday - Gives the player a gift on a specific date(s- Note: Holiday functionality is mostly hard-coded, but you can opt in/out of any holiday

name: ccServerMessage
author: Texafornian
description: Choose when and what messages will automatically appear every hour- If relying on a restart schedule, warn players in advance with a warning

name: ProvincialMusic
author: Texafornian
description: MWSE-LUA mod that plays user-specified music for Project Tamriel  provinces (Province Cyrodiil & Skyrim: Home of the Nords and  Tamriel Rebuilt's Mainland Morrowind in TES III: Morrowind.

name: jcMarketplace
author: JakobCh
description: Allows you to set a price on items and sell them, also blocks other people from picking stuff up.- Supposed to be used with kanaHousing.Usage: see the script file

name: jsonCellLoader
author: JakobCh
description: Load a json file into the current cell.- See the top of the script file for a readme

name: loadtxt2esp
author: JakobCh
description: Load TXT2ESP4 files into a cellUsage: type/loadtxt2esp 'filename'were filename is the file in mp-stuff/data/txt2esp without the .txtExample: I've included the default example file from TXT2ESP4 and you  should be able to spawn it with/loadtxt2esp room\_source3Problems: There are no admin checks so anyone can run the command. Doors dont work

name: brewAlcohol
author: rendeko
description: Allows players to brew alcoholic drinks

name: jrpAnim
author: rendeko
description: GUI for playing animations, with planned sitting/laying and idle animation support.

name: jrpChat
author: rendeko
description: A roleplay based chat overhaul- All chat is local by default except for OOC- Supports nicknames

name: jrpCompanions
author: rendeko
description: A *.json* configurable companion/follower script- (Probably no redundant functions!- Originally forked and heavily modified from Ecarlate

name: jrpRolls
author: rendeko
description: A rolling script that lets players set their own roll bonuses- Roll bonuses can be set by admins

name: jrpStatus
author: rendeko
description: A player-set dialogue other players can see when activating them- Made for roleplay purposes, inspired by WoW addons

name: jrpTravel
author: rendeko
description: Activatable object/NPCs to teleport between Mages Guilds/Telvanni cities without a map- Tamriel Rebuilt support

name: jrpTweaks
author: rendeko
description: Currently, just some bonus spells to make life easier. More planned

name: setSex
author: rendeko
description: Allows setting of character sex on the fly.

name: xCard
author: rendeko
description: An implementation of the X-Card concept by John Stavropoulos.

name: trueDisableAssassins
author: Learwolf
description: This is a tes3mp script that will allow server owners to configure the spawn of Dark Brotherhood Assassins.

name: prematureCorpusFix
author: Learwolf
description: This script will prevent Dagoth Gares from giving players Corprus unless they are on the correct quest to do so.   And for the player to progress when they do have the correct quest, they must activate Dagoth Gares once's he's dead.   This will prevent accidental and pre-mature Corprus acquisition.

name: lucanFixAldruhn
author: Learwolf
description: This script will prevent Lucan from continuosly spawning in Ald-ruhn during his quest line (mv\_thieftrader. If left uncheck, he can cause massive lag and spawn spamming in Ald-ruhn.

name: basicNeeds
author: nalal
description: Adds hunger, thirst and fatigue

name: adminUtils
author: nalal
description: Utilities for admins

name: voteKick
author: nalal
description: Adds vote to kick

name: MotD
description: Display MotD upon login change with /motd changenew MotD

name: FossMail
author: hristoast
description: A script for sending messages and items between players, regardless of whether they are on/offline, via an ingame GUI.

name: IrcBridge
author: hristoast
description: A module to bridge IRC and the in-game chat. It can be easily enhanced to work with Discord using matterbridge

name: RealEstate
author: hristoast
description: A module to provide houses buyable by players.
